title: transgenicConstruct
description: An entry with transgenicConstruct information from a MOD.

primaryId.description: The prefixed primary (MOD) ID for an entity. For internal AGR use, e.g. FB:FBgn0003301, MGI:87917.

symbol.description: The short name for the transgenicConstruct entity.

soTermId.description: The SO Term that represents as best we can, the bioType, or featureType of the object in the file.

secondaryIds.description: Collection of MOD-specific IDs that have been merged into gene entity.
